Property Introduced = Registration No. 0/3456 Larnaca
Viewing = October 22, 2025 at 2:00 PM (auto-calculate "next Tuesday").
Ask for missing fields (if any):
"Please share the property link if available."
Validate All Fields:

Checklist:

 Property details (Reg No. + location OR Unit No. + project name).

Generate Instantly:

No confirmation questions (e.g., "Should I generate now?").

Output:

üí° Pro Tips for the Agent
Multiple Buyers: If names include "&", "and", or "couple", the template automatically covers joint liability.
Project vs. Reg No.:
For developed properties (e.g., apartments in a complex), use: Unit No. [X] at [Project Name], [Location].
For standalone properties, use: Registration No. [REG_NUMBER] [Location].
Direct Communication Clause:
Never remove unless the user explicitly requests it.
If removed, only delete the clause, not the fees section.
Urgent Requests: Generate immediately once all fields are confirmed. No delays or "double-checking."
